text: Amylibacter cionae is a Gram-negative, aerobic, rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Amylibacter which has been isolated from the sea squirt Ciona savignyi from Jiaozhou Bay in China. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Amylibacter cionae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Amylibacter cionae
